sinks.name: TEE_AllocateOperation
sinks.reason: Potential for missing input validation on operation type

sinks.name: TEE_AllocateOperation
sinks.reason: Potential for missing input validation on operation context size

sinks.name: TEE_AllocateTransientObject
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on maxKeySize could lead to buffer overflows or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_AsymmetricEncrypt
sinks.reason: Potential for unencrypted output if srcData is tainted

sinks.name: TEE_AsymmetricEncrypt
sinks.reason: srcLen could lead to buffer overflow if manipulated

sinks.name: TEE_AsymmetricEncrypt
sinks.reason: destLen could lead to memory corruption if manipulated

sinks.name: TEE_AsymmetricEncrypt
sinks.reason: destData could expose sensitive information if shared

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateKey
sinks.reason: keySize parameter could be manipulated to exceed the maximum key size, leading to potential buffer overflow or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_GetObjectInfo1
sinks.reason: Missing input validation on TEE_ObjectHandle could lead to undefined behavior if tainted.

sinks.name: TEE_GetObjectInfo1
sinks.reason: Potential for information leakage if TEE_ObjectInfo is mishandled or exposed to the Normal World.

sinks.name: TEE_SetOperationKey
sinks.reason: Missing input validation for key handle could lead to undefined behavior or security issues.
